means: 感受性强的，敏感的，有接受力的

sentence.Network_en: Earthworms and other essential soil organisms are extremely susceptive to cadmium poisoning.
sentence.Network_cn: 蚯蚓和其他主要的土壤生物都非常容易镉中毒.

sentence.Network_en: Processes with short time constants are fast and susceptive to process noise.
sentence.Network_cn: 流程短在噪音进程中是快速和敏感的.

sentence.Network_en: The ciliated larvae of these monogeneans moved about immediately after hatching and were susceptive to currents.
sentence.Network_cn: 纤毛幼虫孵出后即开始活跃的运动,对水流敏感且对来自宿主鱼和非宿主鱼的组织有相似的趋向反应.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...susceptibly易被感动地、易受影响地、敏感地；susceptive 感受性强的、敏感的、有接受力的；susceptivity（名词）敏感、感受性；
...susceptibly易被感动地、易受影响地、敏感地；susceptive 感受性强的、敏感的、有接受力的；susceptivity（名词）敏感、感受性；
keen敏锐的susceptive易于接受的receptive易接受的
susceptive 敏感, susceptive 易于感受到的, susceptive 敏感性

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin susceptivus, from suscept- 'taken up', from the verb suscipere (see susceptible)

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易受感染的,易受影响的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sus在……下面+cept拿+ible可..的→能被拿下→易受影响
sus在……下面+cept拿+ive……的→有拿下的能力→有接受力的
sus在……下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
sus在……下面+spect看→在下面看一看→suspect怀疑
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂
sus在……下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑
